name: Venomous Claw
description: Rake an enemy with your claw, dealing 1161 Poison Damage and an additional 2315 Poison Damage over 10 seconds.  The poison seeps into the target and deals increased damage the longer it lasts, dealing 20% more damage every 2 seconds.  Enemies hit by the initial hit are afflicted with the Poisoned status effect.
effectLines: Converts into a Stamina ability and deals Poison Damage. The damage over time increases the longer the effect lasts.  Instantly applies the poisoned status effect.
coefDescription: Rake an enemy with your claw, dealing $1 Poison Damage and an additional $2 Poison Damage over 10 seconds.  The poison seeps into the target and deals increased damage the longer it lasts, dealing 20% more damage every 2 seconds.  Enemies hit by the initial hit are afflicted with the Poisoned status effect.
rawDescription:
Rake an enemy with your claw, dealing <<1>> and an additional <<2>> over <<3>>.

The poison seeps into the target and deals increased damage the longer it lasts, dealing <<4>> more damage every <<5>>.

Enemies hit by the initial hit are afflicted with the Poisoned status effect.
